title: Hour 2: Kings of the North!
description:
Marcus Spears hops in and declares the Minnesota Vikings will win the NFC North. Believe it or not Mad Dog agrees? Plus, Paul Finebaum joins the show to breakdown the battle of the unbeatens as Alabama takes on Tennessee. Later Mad Dog, gets mad about the Mets, roughing the passer calls, and analytics in the NFL. Lastly, Marcus Spears and Stephen A. react to breaking news that Davante Adams has been charged with misdemeanor assault.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
